synopsis.text: He has vowed never to abandon his dreams. Yuuta Hoshitani, a student at the esteemed Ayanagi Academy, has finally realized his dream of sharing the stage with his idolized senior, Itsuki Ootori. Now, he sets his sights on his next aspiration, dedicating his days to rigorous musical training. As the second semester commences, a new challenge looms - the Ayanagi Festival class performance, a task they must undertake without the guidance of their senior leaders. Eager to conquer their team boundaries, Yuuta and his peers unite to establish a new company and deliver an unforgettable show. However, their plans are disrupted by the unexpected intervention of the Kao Council, who aim to reform the Ayanagi Festival with a fresh program - the opening ceremony. The chosen performers will be prime candidates for the next Kao Council, but at the cost of missing their class production. As the curtain rises, the youthful, comedic musical unfolds, filled with dreams and challenges.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
